leaf_cluster_name: 生信-宏基因组与微生物生态
task_chain: 组装→分箱→分类→功能注释→统计→benchmark

tools.name: shark
tools.one_line_profile: Mapping-free read selection tool for RNA-Seq data
tools.detailed_description: Shark is a mapping-free software designed to fish relevant reads in an RNA-Seq sample, optimizing the process of selecting specific sequences without full alignment.

tools.name: Arcadia-Science/metagenomics
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for metagenomic QC and profiling
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow designed for quality control, evaluation, and profiling of metagenomic samples, supporting both short-read and long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: SOAPnuke
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated quality control and preprocessing tool for NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for integrated Quality Control and Preprocessing on FASTQ or BAM/CRAM files, developed by BGI. It performs filtering, trimming, and statistics generation for high-throughput sequencing data.

tools.name: Bowtie 2
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and sensitive gapped read aligner
tools.detailed_description: Bowtie 2 is an ultrafast and memory-efficient tool for aligning sequencing reads to long reference sequences. It supports gapped alignment and is widely used in NGS workflows.

tools.name: GateKeeper
tools.one_line_profile: FPGA-accelerated pre-alignment filter for DNA short reads
tools.detailed_description: GateKeeper is a fast alignment filter for DNA short read mapping, designed to quickly reject dissimilar sequences before expensive alignment steps, often utilizing FPGA acceleration.

tools.name: bamql
tools.one_line_profile: Query language for filtering SAM/BAM reads
tools.detailed_description: BamQL provides a query language syntax for filtering reads in SAM/BAM files, allowing for complex selection criteria beyond standard flag filtering.

tools.name: SanitizeMe
tools.one_line_profile: Host contaminant removal tool for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by CDC to remove host contaminants from sequencing files, ensuring privacy and data cleanliness for downstream analysis.

tools.name: SneakySnake
tools.one_line_profile: Hardware-efficient pre-alignment filtering algorithm
tools.detailed_description: SneakySnake is a pre-alignment filtering algorithm that works efficiently on CPU, FPGA, and GPU architectures to expedite sequence alignment calculation for both short and long reads.

tools.name: CebolaLab/RNA-seq
tools.one_line_profile: Step-by-step analysis pipeline for RNA-seq data
tools.detailed_description: A shell-based analysis pipeline for RNA-seq data processing, covering steps from raw reads to expression quantification.

tools.name: fadapa
tools.one_line_profile: Parser for FastQC output data
tools.detailed_description: FAstqc DAta PArser (fadapa) is a minimal Python library to parse FastQC output data into a structured format for programmatic access.

tools.name: UMICollapse
tools.one_line_profile: Fast deduplication for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers
tools.detailed_description: Accelerating the deduplication and collapsing process for reads with Unique Molecular Identifiers (UMI). Heavily optimized for scalability and speed.

tools.name: TrimGalore
tools.one_line_profile: Wrapper for Cutadapt and FastQC for consistent trimming
tools.detailed_description: A wrapper around Cutadapt and FastQC to consistently apply adapter and quality trimming to FastQ files, with extra functionality for RRBS data.

tools.name: sra-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline to download and process SRA files
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline to download sra files from SRA, pipe through fastq_dump and bowtie2, designed for containerized execution.

tools.name: toulligQC
tools.one_line_profile: Post-sequencing QC tool for Oxford Nanopore data
tools.detailed_description: A post sequencing QC tool specifically designed for Oxford Nanopore sequencers to evaluate run quality and read statistics.

tools.name: dropSeqPipe
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for Drop-Seq scRNA-seq preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: A SingleCell RNASeq pre-processing snakemake workflow, specifically tailored for Drop-Seq data analysis.

tools.name: TGSFilter
tools.one_line_profile: Ultra-fast filtering and trimming tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: TGSFilter is an efficient tool designed for the filtering and trimming of Third Generation Sequencing (long read) data.

tools.name: fastprop
tools.one_line_profile: Fast molecular property prediction library
tools.detailed_description: Fast Molecular Property Prediction using mordredcommunity descriptors, designed for cheminformatics and materials science applications.

tools.name: AliNe
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow alignment pipeline from FASTQ to BAM
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow Alignment Pipeline that processes raw fastq.gz files into sorted BAM files, streamlining the alignment workflow.

tools.name: vtkToolbox
tools.one_line_profile: MATLAB interface for VTK scientific visualization
tools.detailed_description: A MEX interface to the VTK library, providing MATLAB functions to read/write VTK files and apply VTK filters for scientific visualization and data processing.

tools.name: FastqCLS
tools.one_line_profile: Score-based reordering compressor for FASTQ data
tools.detailed_description: A robust FASTQ-specific compressor for recent generation sequencing data that utilizes score-based reordering to improve compression ratios.

tools.name: Natrix
tools.one_line_profile: Bioinformatics pipeline for raw sequencing data preprocessing
tools.detailed_description: An open-source bioinformatics pipeline designed for the preprocessing of raw sequencing data, including quality control and filtering steps.

tools.name: DAmar
tools.one_line_profile: Long read QC, assembly and scaffolding pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for Quality Control, assembly, and scaffolding of long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: FastProNGS
tools.one_line_profile: Integrated tool for FASTQ QC, trimming, and statistics
tools.detailed_description: A tool used to cut adapter, perform quality control, trimming, splitting, and statistics generation for fastq data.

tools.name: Ktrim
tools.one_line_profile: Extra-fast and accurate adapter and quality trimmer for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: Ktrim is a lightweight and efficient tool designed for the quality control of high-throughput sequencing data. It performs adapter trimming and quality filtering with high speed and accuracy, suitable for preprocessing raw reads before downstream analysis.

tools.name: HoCoRT
tools.one_line_profile: Host Contamination Removal Tool for sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: HoCoRT (Host Contamination Removal Tool) is a pipeline designed to efficiently remove specific organism sequences (such as host contamination) from sequencing reads. It utilizes fast alignment tools like Bowtie2 and Hisat2 to filter out unwanted reads while preserving the target microbial data.

tools.name: AlignQC
tools.one_line_profile: Analysis and quality control tool for long read alignments
tools.detailed_description: AlignQC is a tool for analyzing long-read sequencing alignments. It generates comprehensive reports on mappability, error patterns, and read characteristics from BAM files, outputting XHTML reports for visualization and quality assessment of long-read data.

tools.name: eASV-pipeline-for-515Y-926R
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for analyzing mixed 16S/18S amplicon sequences
tools.detailed_description: This pipeline is designed for the analysis of mixed 16S and 18S amplicon sequences, specifically targeting the 515Y-926R primer set. It integrates tools like QIIME2, DADA2, and Deblur to perform quality control, denoising, and taxonomic classification for microbial ecology studies.

tools.name: needLR
tools.one_line_profile: Structural variant filtering and prioritization for long-read data
tools.detailed_description: needLR is a tool for filtering and prioritizing structural variants (SVs) detected in long-read sequencing data. It helps in reducing false positives and identifying high-confidence SVs for downstream genomic analysis.

tools.name: TaxTriage
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow workflow for agnostic identification and classification of microbial organisms
tools.detailed_description: TaxTriage is a flexible Nextflow workflow designed for the agnostic identification and classification of microbial organisms from both short-read and long-read metagenomic NGS data. It facilitates rapid triage and analysis of metagenomic samples.

tools.name: fastqcr
tools.one_line_profile: R package for quality control of sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: fastqcr is an R package that facilitates the quality control of sequencing data. It allows users to run FastQC from within R, aggregate the results, and generate summary reports, streamlining the QC process for large datasets.

tools.name: FastQt
tools.one_line_profile: FastQC port to Qt5 for high throughput sequence data quality control
tools.detailed_description: FastQt is a graphical user interface tool for quality control of high-throughput sequencing data, ported from FastQC to the Qt5 framework. It provides an interactive environment for visualizing and assessing the quality of sequencing reads.

tools.name: FastqCleaner
tools.one_line_profile: Shiny application for quality control, filtering, and trimming of FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: FastqCleaner is a Bioconductor package providing a Shiny web application and R functions for the quality control, filtering, and trimming of FASTQ files. It offers a user-friendly interface for preprocessing sequencing data.

tools.name: trimadap
tools.one_line_profile: Fast but inaccurate adapter trimmer for Illumina reads
tools.detailed_description: trimadap is a lightweight C tool developed by Heng Li for removing adapter sequences from Illumina sequencing reads. It prioritizes speed and is designed for specific use cases where heuristic trimming is sufficient.

tools.name: primer-trimming
tools.one_line_profile: Fast C code for identifying and removing primers and adapters
tools.detailed_description: primer-trimming is a fast C-based utility for identifying and removing primer and adapter sequences from sequencing data. It is designed for efficient preprocessing of reads in metagenomic and genomic workflows.

tools.name: Cutadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to remove adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other unwanted sequence from high-throughput sequencing reads
tools.detailed_description: Cutadapt finds and removes adapter sequences, primers, poly-A tails and other types of unwanted sequence from your high-throughput sequencing reads. It is one of the most widely used tools for cleaning NGS data before alignment or assembly.

tools.name: slide_snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake pipeline for spatial transcriptomics data processing
tools.detailed_description: slide_snake is a Snakemake pipeline designed for the preprocessing, alignment, quality control, and quantification of spatial transcriptomics data. It supports both short-read and long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: Metagenomics-Toolkit
tools.one_line_profile: Scalable, data-agnostic workflow for short and long metagenomic read analysis
tools.detailed_description: A scalable workflow that automates the analysis of short and long metagenomic reads obtained from Illumina or Oxford Nanopore Technology devices. It handles quality control, assembly, and other downstream tasks in a reproducible manner.

tools.name: ChIPSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing script for ChIP-Seq data from FASTQ to peaks
tools.detailed_description: A script for full processing of ChIP-Seq data starting from fastq files. It performs FastQC quality control, mapping to human or mouse genomes using BWA, SAM/BAM conversion, peak calling with MACS, and BigWig generation.

tools.name: rnaSeqFPro
tools.one_line_profile: Automated processing script for RNA-Seq data analysis
tools.detailed_description: A script for full processing of RNA-Seq data starting from fastq files. It integrates FastQC, STAR mapping, featureCounts, and DESeq2 for differential expression analysis and visualization.

tools.name: Ancient_mtDNA_Pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for processing ancient mitochondrial DNA paired-end reads
tools.detailed_description: Analysis pipeline designed for processing paired-end Illumina reads obtained after ancient mtDNA target enrichment capture, handling the specific characteristics of ancient DNA damage and processing.

tools.name: TidyMultiqc
tools.one_line_profile: Converter for MultiQC reports into Tidy data frames
tools.detailed_description: A utility that converts 'MultiQC' reports into Tidy data frames, facilitating downstream statistical analysis and visualization of quality control metrics within the R ecosystem.

tools.name: nf-cmgg/preprocessing
tools.one_line_profile: Sequencing data preprocessing workflow
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow workflow for the preprocessing of sequencing data, likely including quality control and trimming steps tailored for CMGG facilities.

tools.name: nf-core/bamtofastq
tools.one_line_profile: BAM/CRAM to FASTQ conversion and QC pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that converts BAM or CRAM files to FASTQ format and performs quality control checks, useful for reverting aligned data to raw reads for re-analysis.

tools.name: nf-core/detaxizer
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for taxonomic classification and filtering (host removal)
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to identify and optionally remove certain sequences (taxa) from raw genomic data, such as removing human host reads from metagenomic samples.

tools.name: nf-core/hgtseq
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for investigating horizontal gene transfer from NGS data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline to detect and investigate horizontal gene transfer events using Next Generation Sequencing data.

tools.name: nf-core/seqinspector
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive QC-only pipeline for sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A dedicated pipeline for running a large set of quality control tools on sequencing data, generating global and group-specific MultiQC reports, targeting core facilities or high-throughput groups.

tools.name: autoadapt
tools.one_line_profile: Automatic quality control and adapter trimming for FASTQ files
tools.detailed_description: A tool for automatic quality control of FASTQ sequencing files, likely handling adapter detection and trimming.

tools.name: mpox-nf
tools.one_line_profile: Monkeypox virus assembly and host-removal pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline for Monkeypox virus (MPXV) assembly, including host-removal, reference-based assembly, and generation of sequence quality metrics for Illumina paired-end shotgun metagenomic data.

tools.name: fqc
tools.one_line_profile: Extensible quality control dashboard for FASTQ assessment
tools.detailed_description: A quality control dashboard built around FASTQ assessment, providing visualization of sequencing data quality metrics.

tools.name: clean
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for decontamination of short reads, long reads and contigs
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the decontamination of sequencing data, supporting short reads, long reads, and contigs, suitable for removing host or contaminant sequences.

tools.name: fastq.bio
tools.one_line_profile: Interactive web tool for DNA sequencing quality control
tools.detailed_description: An interactive web-based tool for performing quality control on DNA sequencing data (FASTQ files), utilizing WebAssembly for client-side processing.

tools.name: fastq.bio-serverless
tools.one_line_profile: Serverless version of fastq.bio for sequencing QC
tools.detailed_description: A serverless implementation of the fastq.bio tool, using Cloudflare workers and WebAssembly to perform quality control on DNA sequencing data.

tools.name: minion_multiQC
tools.one_line_profile: Multi-tool QC wrapper for MinION data
tools.detailed_description: A tool to aggregate quality control metrics for Oxford Nanopore MinION data, likely integrating with MultiQC.

tools.name: Filtlong
tools.one_line_profile: Quality filtering tool for long reads (Nanopore/PacBio)
tools.detailed_description: A tool for filtering long reads (e.g., Oxford Nanopore, PacBio) by quality, length, and other metrics to improve downstream assembly or analysis.

tools.name: Porechop
tools.one_line_profile: Adapter trimmer for Oxford Nanopore reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool for finding and removing adapters from Oxford Nanopore reads. Adapters on the ends of reads are trimmed, and when a read has an adapter in its middle, it is treated as a chimera and chopped into separate reads.

tools.name: FastQC
tools.one_line_profile: Standard quality control tool for high throughput sequence data
tools.detailed_description: A quality control analysis tool which provides a modular set of analyses which you can use to give a quick impression of whether your data has any problems of which you should be aware before doing any further analysis.

tools.name: chopper
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for partitioning biological sequences into similar batches
tools.detailed_description: A tool part of the SeqAn ecosystem for partitioning a set of sequences into batches (bins) that are similar in terms of their k-mer content, useful for parallel processing or indexing.

tools.name: sequana_fastqc
tools.one_line_profile: Sequana pipeline for parallel FastQC and MultiQC summary
tools.detailed_description: A Sequana pipeline that runs FastQC in parallel on multiple samples and summarizes the results using MultiQC, streamlining the QC process.

tools.name: NxTrim
tools.one_line_profile: Adapter trimming for Illumina Nextera Mate Pair libraries
tools.detailed_description: A tool for adapter trimming and virtual library creation specifically for Illumina Nextera Mate Pair libraries, separating true mate pairs from paired-end reads.

tools.name: FastPCC
tools.one_line_profile: Fast calculation of interstation correlations for seismic noise
tools.detailed_description: A tool to compute interstation correlations of seismic ambient noise, including fast implementations of standard, 1-bit, phase, and wavelet phase cross-correlations.

tools.name: Trimmomatic-pigz
tools.one_line_profile: Accelerated version of Trimmomatic using pigz
tools.detailed_description: A modified version of the official Trimmomatic tool that utilizes pigz for parallel gzip compression/decompression, offering significantly faster processing speeds with identical results.

tools.name: falco
tools.one_line_profile: High-performance C++ replacement for FastQC
tools.detailed_description: A C++ drop-in replacement for FastQC to assess the quality of sequence read data, offering faster performance while producing compatible reports.

tools.name: BASALT
tools.one_line_profile: Binning and refinement toolkit for short- and long-read metagenomic sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: BASALT (Binning Across a Series of Assemblies Toolkit) is a pipeline designed for the binning and refinement of metagenomic data derived from both short and long sequencing reads. It integrates multiple assembly and binning strategies to improve the recovery of high-quality metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: MetaMDBG
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight assembler for long and accurate metagenomics reads
tools.detailed_description: MetaMDBG is a de novo assembler specifically designed for long and accurate metagenomic reads (e.g., PacBio HiFi). It uses a multi-k de Bruijn graph approach to efficiently assemble complex metagenomic communities with low memory usage.

tools.name: Geo-omics scripts
tools.one_line_profile: Collection of metagenomic pipelines and general scripts
tools.detailed_description: A repository containing various scripts and pipelines for metagenomic analysis, including processing and assembly tasks used in the Geo-omics lab context.

tools.name: haploMAGIC
tools.one_line_profile: Phasing and haplotype reconstruction tool for multiparental populations
tools.detailed_description: haploMAGIC is a tool for phasing, haplotype reconstruction, and crossover detection using single-nucleotide polymorphism (SNP) data, specifically tailored for multiparental populations.

tools.name: MegaGTA
tools.one_line_profile: HMM-guided metagenomic gene-targeted assembler
tools.detailed_description: MegaGTA is a gene-targeted assembler for metagenomic data that utilizes Hidden Markov Models (HMMs) and iterative de Bruijn graphs to reconstruct specific gene sequences from complex metagenomic samples.

tools.name: HINGE
tools.one_line_profile: Long-read assembler optimized for repeat resolution
tools.detailed_description: HINGE is a de novo assembler for long-read sequencing data that focuses on optimal repeat resolution by distinguishing between repeats that can be bridged by reads and those that cannot.

tools.name: Iterative-Hybrid-Assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Unicycler-based iterative hybrid assembly pipeline for MAG reconstruction
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to reconstruct high-quality Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) from enrichment systems using an iterative hybrid assembly approach based on Unicycler.

tools.name: viGEN
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral RNA exploration in human NGS data
tools.detailed_description: viGEN is a bioinformatics pipeline designed to detect and explore viral RNA sequences within human Next-Generation Sequencing (NGS) data, facilitating viral metagenomics studies.

tools.name: PHap
tools.one_line_profile: Haplotype-resolved assembly pipeline for autopolyploids
tools.detailed_description: PHap is a genome assembly pipeline tailored for autopolyploids that produces haplotype-resolved and telomere-to-telomere assemblies using long-read and Hi-C sequencing data.

tools.name: Autometa
tools.one_line_profile: Automated extraction of genomes from shotgun metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: Autometa is a tool for the automated binning and extraction of microbial genomes from shotgun metagenomic datasets, utilizing coverage and sequence composition information.

tools.name: MeGAMerge
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to merge assembled contigs and long reads
tools.detailed_description: MeGAMerge is a tool designed to merge assembled contigs and long reads from metagenomic sequencing runs, improving assembly continuity.

tools.name: ont-assembly-snake
tools.one_line_profile: Snakemake workflow for bacterial genome assembly and polishing
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow for assembling and polishing bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore Technologies (ONT) sequencing data, integrating multiple assembly and polishing tools.

tools.name: HyLight
tools.one_line_profile: Strain-aware de novo assembly method for metagenomics
tools.detailed_description: HyLight is a hybrid assembly method based on the overlap-layout-consensus (OLC) paradigm that leverages both NGS and third-generation sequencing data to assemble complex metagenomic data with strain awareness.

tools.name: CAT/BAT/RAT (dev)
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: Development version of CAT/BAT/RAT, a suite of tools for the taxonomic classification of contigs and Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs), as well as taxonomic profiling of metagenomes.

tools.name: CAT/BAT/RAT
tools.one_line_profile: Taxonomic classification of contigs and MAGs
tools.detailed_description: CAT (Contig Annotation Tool) and BAT (Bin Annotation Tool) are pipelines for the taxonomic classification of long DNA sequences and metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs).

tools.name: Wochenende
tools.one_line_profile: Whole genome/metagenome sequencing alignment pipeline
tools.detailed_description: Wochenende is a pipeline for the alignment, filtering, and visualization of whole genome and metagenome sequencing data, aiding in the detection and analysis of species in complex samples.

tools.name: nf_wochenende
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow version of the Wochenende metagenome pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow implementation of the Wochenende pipeline for reference-based metagenome binning, alignment, and visualization.

tools.name: Inspector
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for evaluating long-read de novo assembly results
tools.detailed_description: Inspector is a tool designed to evaluate the quality of de novo assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, identifying assembly errors and assessing continuity.

tools.name: copycat
tools.one_line_profile: Script to bin read coverage across a genome
tools.detailed_description: Copycat captures and bins read coverage across a genome from a BAM file, outputting coverage information suitable for copy number variation analysis and visualization.

tools.name: ViPER
tools.one_line_profile: Viral metagenomics pipeline for trimming, assembly, and classification
tools.detailed_description: ViPER is a bioinformatics pipeline for viral metagenomics that handles read trimming, de novo assembly, and taxonomic classification of the resulting contigs.

tools.name: MetaSUB_CAP
tools.one_line_profile: Comprehensive pipeline for short read metagenomic data
tools.detailed_description: MetaSUB_CAP is a comprehensive analysis pipeline designed for processing short-read metagenomic data, developed by the MetaSUB consortium.

tools.name: NovoGraph
tools.one_line_profile: Building whole genome graphs from long-read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: NovoGraph is a tool for constructing whole genome graphs from de novo assemblies generated from long-read sequencing data, facilitating the analysis of structural variations and genome complexity.

tools.name: ViruSpy
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for viral identification from metagenomic samples
tools.detailed_description: ViruSpy is a pipeline designed to identify viral sequences within metagenomic samples, aiding in viral ecology and pathogen detection studies.

tools.name: de-novo-transcriptome-assembly-pipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Combined de novo transcriptome assembly pipeline
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for de novo transcriptome assembly that combines results from multiple assemblers and parameters to improve assembly quality.

tools.name: NextDenovo
tools.one_line_profile: Fast and accurate de novo assembler for long reads
tools.detailed_description: NextDenovo is a string graph-based de novo assembler designed for long-read sequencing data (PacBio/Nanopore), optimized for speed and accuracy in assembling large genomes.

tools.name: NextPolish
tools.one_line_profile: Genome polishing tool for long reads
tools.detailed_description: NextPolish is a tool for polishing genome assemblies using long reads (and optionally short reads) to correct base errors and improve assembly quality.

tools.name: NextPolish2
tools.one_line_profile: Repeat-aware polishing for HiFi long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: NextPolish2 is the successor to NextPolish, specifically designed for repeat-aware polishing of genomes assembled using PacBio HiFi long reads.

tools.name: Mapler
tools.one_line_profile: Metagenome assembly and evaluation pipeline for long reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed for metagenome assembly and evaluation, specifically optimized for HiFi long reads but also supporting LoFi long reads and hybrid assembly strategies.

tools.name: DataQualityDashboard
tools.one_line_profile: Data quality assessment tool for observational health data
tools.detailed_description: A tool developed by the OHDSI community to characterize and assess the quality of observational health data by applying a set of data quality checks and generating a transparent report.

tools.name: Corset
tools.one_line_profile: Clustering tool for de novo assembled transcripts
tools.detailed_description: Software for clustering de novo assembled transcripts and counting overlapping reads, useful for transcriptomics analysis where a reference genome is not available.

tools.name: EasyNanoMeta
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for nanopore long-read metagenomic analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline specifically designed for the analysis of metagenomic data generated by Nanopore long-read sequencing technologies.

tools.name: pb-metagenomics-tools
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for PacBio HiFi metagenomics analysis
tools.detailed_description: A collection of tools and pipelines tailored for processing and analyzing PacBio HiFi reads in metagenomics studies, including assembly and taxonomic profiling.

tools.name: CoCoNet
tools.one_line_profile: Unsupervised binning tool for viral metagenomes
tools.detailed_description: A deep learning-based tool for unsupervised binning of contigs from viral metagenomes, facilitating the reconstruction of viral genomes from mixed samples.

tools.name: phamb
tools.one_line_profile: Post-processing tool for VAMB viral binning
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed for the downstream processing of bins generated by VAMB, specifically focused on viral elucidation and refinement of viral bins.

tools.name: vamb
tools.one_line_profile: Variational autoencoder for metagenomic binning
tools.detailed_description: A metagenomic binning tool that uses a variational autoencoder to encode sequence information and cluster contigs into bins, suitable for large-scale datasets.

tools.name: Eukfinder
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for retrieving microbial eukaryote genomes
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline designed to retrieve and assemble microbial eukaryote genomes from metagenomic sequencing data.

tools.name: Hairsplitter
tools.one_line_profile: Assembly refinement tool for separating collapsed sequences
tools.detailed_description: Software that separates very close sequences (e.g., strains or haplotypes) that have been collapsed during assembly, utilizing long-read data.

tools.name: Path-Flyer
tools.one_line_profile: Benchmark suite for quadrotor path following algorithms
tools.detailed_description: A benchmarking tool for evaluating and comparing different quadrotor path following algorithms, useful for robotics and control systems research.

tools.name: PhasedDiploidGenomeAssemblyPipeline
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for reference-free diploid genome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that combines de-novo assembly and read-phasing techniques to assemble diploid genomes without requiring a reference genome.

tools.name: Magni
tools.one_line_profile: Framework for AFM image reconstruction and compressed sensing
tools.detailed_description: A Python package for Atomic Force Microscopy (AFM) image reconstruction and general compressed sensing applications, supporting scientific imaging research.

tools.name: reticulatus
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling and polishing long genomes
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake-based pipeline designed for assembling and polishing long genomes using long nanopore sequencing reads.

tools.name: cFMD
tools.one_line_profile: Curated Food Metagenomic Data repository and access
tools.detailed_description: A repository and associated resources for accessing the curatedFoodMetagenomicData (cFMD) dataset, facilitating analysis of food-associated microbiomes.

tools.name: mmlong2
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for MAG recovery and analysis
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline for the recovery and analysis of metagenome-assembled genomes (MAGs), integrating various assembly and binning steps.

tools.name: mmlong2-lite
tools.one_line_profile: Lightweight pipeline for microbial genome recovery
tools.detailed_description: A lightweight version of the mmlong2 pipeline, optimized for microbial genome recovery from metagenomic data.

tools.name: XFEM_Fracture2D
tools.one_line_profile: 2D fracture mechanics solver using XFEM
tools.detailed_description: A MATLAB program for solving fracture problems involving arbitrary multiple crack propagations in 2D linear-elastic solids using the Extended Finite Element Method (XFEM).

tools.name: Vamba
tools.one_line_profile: Hybrid Mamba-Transformer model for long video understanding
tools.detailed_description: Implementation of the Vamba model, a hybrid architecture combining Mamba and Transformers for understanding hour-long videos, presented at ICCV 2025.

tools.name: HMSSS
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for identifying sulfur metabolism-related genes
tools.detailed_description: A tool for the identification of sulfur metabolism-related genes and analysis of operon structures in genome and metagenome assemblies.

tools.name: ILRA
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for improvement of long read assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to assist in the post-assembly process (finishing) by cleaning and merging contigs, correcting homopolymer tracks, and circulating plastids.

tools.name: TSSKit
tools.one_line_profile: Threshold Signature Scheme Toolkit
tools.detailed_description: A toolkit implementing Threshold Signature Schemes (TSS), useful for cryptographic research and secure multi-party computation.

tools.name: KOunt
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for calculating KEGG orthologue abundance
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake pipeline for calculating the abundance of KEGG orthologues in metagenomic sequence data, aiding in functional profiling.

tools.name: TIPP
tools.one_line_profile: Toolkit for telomere assembly and genome polishing
tools.detailed_description: A set of tools for telomere local assembly, improved whole genome polishing, and plastid assembly, enhancing genome assembly quality.

tools.name: METAMVGL

tools.detailed_description: A binning algorithm that integrates assembly graphs and paired-end graphs using a multi-view graph-based approach to improve metagenomic contig binning.

tools.name: VNom
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free tool for nominating viroid-like contigs
tools.detailed_description: A tool for identifying viroid-like contigs from de novo assembled data without relying on reference sequences, useful for viroid discovery.

tools.name: dentist
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for closing assembly gaps using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to close gaps in genome assemblies with high accuracy by utilizing long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: graphamr

tools.detailed_description: A pipeline for predicting antibiotic resistance genes directly from metagenome assembly graphs, enabling AMR detection in complex metagenomic data.

tools.name: metaGT

tools.detailed_description: A Nextflow pipeline designed for the joint assembly of metagenomic and metatranscriptomic data to improve assembly quality and transcript recovery.

tools.name: StringDecomposer
tools.one_line_profile: Tool for decomposition of centromeric assemblies and long reads into monomers
tools.detailed_description: An algorithm for decomposing long reads or assemblies of centromeric regions into a sequence of monomers, useful for analyzing repetitive genomic structures.

tools.name: YAMP
tools.one_line_profile: Yet Another Metagenomic Pipeline for QC and characterization
tools.detailed_description: A containerized Nextflow pipeline for processing metagenomic data, including quality control, decontamination, and taxonomic/functional profiling.

tools.name: VirSearch
tools.one_line_profile: Workflow to detect and classify viruses in metagenome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A Snakemake workflow designed to identify and classify viral sequences within metagenomic assemblies using various viral detection tools.

tools.name: nxf-kraken2
tools.one_line_profile: Nextflow pipeline for running Kraken2 and Bracken
tools.detailed_description: A streamlined Nextflow pipeline for taxonomic classification and abundance estimation using Kraken2 and Bracken in Docker containers.

tools.name: MAGPurify2
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to identify and remove contaminants from metagenome-assembled genomes
tools.detailed_description: A tool designed to improve the quality of Metagenome-Assembled Genomes (MAGs) by detecting and removing contamination based on genomic features.

tools.name: SOAPdenovo-Trans
tools.one_line_profile: De novo transcriptome assembler designed for RNA-Seq
tools.detailed_description: A de novo transcriptome assembler specifically designed for RNA-Seq data, capable of handling alternative splicing and variable expression levels.

tools.name: SOAPdenovo2
tools.one_line_profile: Short-read de novo genome assembler
tools.detailed_description: A widely used de novo genome assembler for short-read sequencing data, optimized for large genomes and high memory efficiency.

tools.name: T2T-Polish
tools.one_line_profile: Evaluation and polishing workflows for T2T genome assemblies
tools.detailed_description: A collection of workflows used for polishing and evaluating Telomere-to-Telomere (T2T) genome assemblies, ensuring high base-level accuracy.

tools.name: Chloroplast-genome-assembly
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for assembling chloroplast genomes using short/long reads
tools.detailed_description: A pipeline designed to facilitate the de novo assembly of chloroplast genomes from NGS short reads or long read data.

tools.name: assembleBAC-ONT
tools.one_line_profile: Pipeline for de novo assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes from ONT data
tools.detailed_description: A bioinformatics pipeline that performs de novo assembly and annotation of bacterial genomes using Oxford Nanopore (ONT) long-read sequencing data.

tools.name: LongStitch
tools.one_line_profile: Tool to correct and scaffold assemblies using long reads
tools.detailed_description: A scalable pipeline that corrects and scaffolds genome assemblies using long-read sequencing data (e.g., Nanopore) to improve contiguity.

tools.name: RNA-Bloom
tools.one_line_profile: Reference-free transcriptome assembly for short and long reads
tools.detailed_description: A de novo transcriptome assembler that leverages bloom filters to assemble transcripts from short or long read RNA-seq data without a reference genome.

tools.name: ARCS
tools.one_line_profile: Scaffold genome sequence assemblies using linked or long read sequencing data
tools.detailed_description: A tool for scaffolding genome assemblies using 10x Genomics linked reads or other long-range sequencing information.

tools.name: GoldRush
tools.one_line_profile: Linear-time de novo Long Read Assembler
tools.detailed_description: A de novo assembler for long-read sequencing data designed to operate with linear time complexity relative to genome size.

tools.name: ntEdit
tools.one_line_profile: Genome assembly polishing and SNV detection
tools.detailed_description: A scalable genomics application for polishing genome assemblies and detecting single nucleotide variations (SNVs) using Bloom filters.

tools.name: ntLink

tools.detailed_description: A tool that uses minimizers to map long reads and scaffold genome assemblies, offering a lightweight alternative to alignment-based scaffolding.

tools.name: Arete

tools.detailed_description: A workflow for analyzing bacterial genomes with a focus on Antimicrobial Resistance (AMR), Virulence Factors (VF), and Lateral Gene Transfer (LGT).

tools.name: Mitogenome_assembler
tools.one_line_profile: Assembler for plant mitochondrial genomes
tools.detailed_description: A specialized tool developed for the de novo assembly of complex plant mitochondrial genomes.

tools.name: ShortBRED

tools.detailed_description: A pipeline that creates unique markers for protein families and searches for them in metagenomic data to determine presence and abundance.

tools.name: metagenome_assembly
tools.one_line_profile: WDL Workflow for metagenome assembly
tools.detailed_description: A WDL-based workflow for performing metagenome assembly, likely designed for cloud or cluster execution.

tools.name: MetaWRAP

tools.detailed_description: A comprehensive pipeline that integrates various metagenomic tools for assembly, binning, and bin refinement to produce high-quality MAGs.

tools.name: GraffiTE

tools.name: SURPI+

tools.name: EsViritu

tools.detailed_description: EsViritu is a pipeline designed for the detection and measurement of viral pathogens in metagenomic or clinical data via read mapping.

tools.name: MetaSBT

tools.name: ARGfams

tools.name: BugBuster

tools.name: ARGprofiler
